to all those who trot out the "why does interoperability in healthcare lag other industries" trope this is today. facebook bought instagram nine years ago https://twitter.com/healthbjk/status/1369058085268987904/photo/1

- Brendan Keeler (@healthbjk)

Your points as to ACH payment between bank accounts taking 3 days :joy:
You’re right, maybe we shouldn’t be surprised if/when healthcare interoperability stands as the bellweather of interoperability capabilities for all business sectors
